game.name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals is a multiplayer horror party game with multiple modes where players take on the role of monsters or mortals from Dark Deception's universe (and other universes) and fight for soul shards in nightmarish mazes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals is a multiplayer horror party game with multiple modes where players take on the role of monsters or mortals from Dark Deception's universe (and other universes) and fight for soul shards in nightmarish mazes!

reviewHighlights.text: 꼭 '친구'랑 해야 재밌는게임 난 DLC 안산다 마인드는 안 사야하는 게임
